Reviews.Title: This phone is awsome
Reviews.Author: Mark V. Epelbaum "Mordechi"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use very responsive touch screen excellent speed processor. The Wi-Fi connection has a long range and the 3G is awesome. All around this is a very solid LG phone, it has a nice size screen to watch you tube videos, it also has a good camera with auto face detection. The operating system is very good, Android Froyo.

Reviews.Title: Excels All Expectations!
Reviews.Author: Paul "wds"
Reviews.Content: You get all that you want! Wi-Fi, internet, turn-by-turn directions on GPS, tethering, camera, video, and more. Tethering works flawless uninterrupted. Cannot expect more.  The camera quality is superb and easy to sync with computer. Android adds extra power to the device. In brief, this is an excellent phone with all the features we would use in our day to day life. The touchscreen is perfectly sensitive without any annoyance.I will definitely recommend this phone to my friends and relatives.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone for the price :)
Reviews.Author: kdb
Reviews.Content: Needed an unlocked smartphone that was affordable but could do everything we needed and vola! The phone isn't warp speed with processing but it is sleek, easy to use, and works great!  If you're looking to join SimpleMobile this is a perfect phone to get - took a whole 2 minutes to get it going :)

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Shaberraca Colbert
Reviews.Content: does everything you need and then some once you set up your apn (internet service) for what type of phone company you have, great price, and very stylish almost something like an iphone! couldnt be more happy i would def recommend this phone to anyone!

Reviews.Title: my first android phone after Windows Phone 7
Reviews.Author: Atul Shukla
Reviews.Content: Ordered the phone on July 10, shipped on 11th and delivered on 12th (opted standard 5-7 business days delivery which was free). I am very pleased with the delivery. It was really fast.Packed in good manner. Battery was 70% charged, started without any problem. This is unlocked model and I used AT&T; SIM to it. It worked without any problem.It is only 1 day since I am using it so it is too early to give any comments. So far it is very good. I haven't faced any problems with it.Very light weight compared to existing windows phone 7 HTC HD7.Call voice quality is not that good but with this cost it is acceptable.UPDATE: AT&T; Data plan is not working with this phone. I spoke to AT&T; customer service and even if they registered this Phone's IMEI number in the account, Data Communication is still not working. I guess I just wasted the money on this 'Cananda' based phone. Once I used Nokia E72 unlocked phone with AT&T;, and it worked like charm. I wish I could have the same Nokia phone handy.UPDATE 8/22/2013: After reviewing an user comment, I realized that I gave wrong feedback. Changing 4 star to 2 Star. Actually delivery, packaging all matters when actual product function and behave as per expectation which it did not.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Jonathan D. Bobrow
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone because I wanted to upgrade to a smartphone that had WIFI.This phone has a lot of good features, and I avoid the Telecom carrier upgrade charge, extension of contract and don't need to buy their data plan as I use the WIFI only.Only negative about the phone is that it is not one of their popular models so it does not have it's own manual.  Other than that it has been great.

Reviews.Title: worked for only 4 hours no stars
Reviews.Author: joseph b. kernak
Reviews.Content: i am one of the search and rescue teams in this community and i expected this phone to work for me ,  but it didn't.  i had it on all night and no one called me on it.  when day light came i noticed that it didn't have a signal.  i asked others if they had signal and they said they do.  told them to call my number but got a recording.  tried other sim cards still the same.  got a lemon good. tried two other sims on it.feel ripped

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: kb
Reviews.Content: It is a great phone but turns out it was not released in the states it was instead sold to the Canadian market and in Korea. With that said it does not take away from the quality and in fact adds a little bit to the cool factor as you will be the only kid on the block sporting a Chic. Also calling it a Chic will get you teased by your friends. If you have an ATT or T Mobile you will have to get on line for some special instructions on how to get the web up and running. I found a video by tech buffalo that covered it and now its been smooth sailing.

Reviews.Title: Great phone , Great OS
Reviews.Author: Danny
Reviews.Content: it's a pretty great phone, good performance. The only thing is 3G Doesn't work in my Country. I live in Venezuela and for some reason it doesn't get the 3G network. Pretty bad for me.

Reviews.Title: didn't like it
Reviews.Author: cliff
Reviews.Content: I got this phone with the idea that it would work on my system the description was not very clear although it did come on time and may work for you

Reviews.Title: very small screen
Reviews.Author: Miguel WestPalm
Reviews.Content: The phone is not bad but the screen and resolution it is too small and low for me plus the icons and other stuff looks no that good in this phone but at least works ok as a phone for calls.

Reviews.Title: good experience!
Reviews.Author: Felix Ch
Reviews.Content: very good experience, I work excellently, battery charge very well, there is no objection, the product is good for the cost I paid for it!

Reviews.Title: Ok phone
Reviews.Author: Jazz R "drum nerd"
Reviews.Content: Ok phone, pretty slow though. Crashes fairly often, especially when trying to text or check email. Ok for the price.

Reviews.Title: it was ok
Reviews.Author: ray
Reviews.Content: Features didn't work well with ATT, had to give it to my friend . It work well with their verizon carrier

Reviews.Title: Not worth the price
Reviews.Author: lak
Reviews.Content: bought this phone expecting to use the  3G connection to browse e-mail  when traveling and  as a replacement for a GPS.  but the phone get stuck all the time  not to mention it is too slow as well.  Now I use this phone only to make calls. its is not even doing  that job well. signal drops all the time. when it lose the signal connection (inside a building)  when I come out it takes about 2-5 mins to  catch the connection. (I used an old Sony Ericsson before it didn't  have these problems ). if you want to buy a smart phone spend $100 more and buy a decent  smart phone.  otherwise spend like  $10-20  and buy a cheap regular phone.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre smart phone
Reviews.Author: Volkert Kreuk
Reviews.Content: Small screen size and poor screen quality.  Recommended for people who want the illusion of owning a smart phone.  Start-up time and battery life are above par.

Reviews.Title: cell phone
Reviews.Author: shay
Reviews.Content: The phone is ok but it doesn't get internet. We can't figure out why when it's a wi fi phone.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: chao
Reviews.Content: The phone is great and comes right on time with great packaging. Works really good. The browser is great exceptt that its smaller than the picture looks. Its just chicky as described and very responsive keyboard. Will recomend it to any one who wants a stylish phone. memory space is small.  It keeps saying memory full.no where to save info

Reviews.Title: LG Optimus
Reviews.Author: Jack R Stansall
Reviews.Content: I liked this phone very much,but the sd card that came with it did not work. I tryed a 4,8,& 32 gb and none of them worked . Half of the functions of the phone don't work without sd card. Had to return the phone.

Reviews.Title: Ok for Smart Phone beginners
Reviews.Author: Waqar A. Nadeem
Reviews.Content: I returned this device as it was not able to fulfill my requirements. However a good device for beginners and they can play and understand how Android Devices work, any how good for YouTube Videos and small apps.

Reviews.Title: Tiny little phone
Reviews.Author: abdul
Reviews.Content: I wish the ad mentioned the dimensions of the phone or the length of the screen. Until i received it when I saw on the box that the size is 3.2" ... I find the pics in the ad misleading and trying to make the phone look like it's big or something .... I looked like it would be the same size as LG P920. Very small for a smart phone ... even smaller than the iPod 4G. You gotta have little tiny baby fingers for this phone.The display quality is pretty good. WIFI and video play fast, It is light and the cam is alright.cheap phone for good reasons

Reviews.Title: GET IT NOW
Reviews.Author: vasanten
Reviews.Content: This phone is the best phone, despite that it is a little, little; it has great features & the battery life is great, but there shipping took long but the refunded my money for the shipping ^__^
